author: patrickl
msg: Correct URL references so that they contain the appropriate URL rewriting

author: patrickl
msg: Changed webapp to use frames like the prototype posted to the tomcat-dev mailing list. Also, added workaround so that login.jsp will not load within a frame.

author: craigmcc
msg: Backport the enforcement of needing a "Host:" header on HTTP/1.1 requests.

author: craigmcc
msg: Enforce the requirement (RFC 2616, Section 5.2) that an HTTP/1.1 request
MUST contain a "Host:" header to be valid.

author: craigmcc
msg: Backport the HTTP/1.1 compliance fix to send 400 (bad request) instead of
500 (internal server error) on an unrecognized or missing host.
